topic.title: Converting Old Templates to Newer Versions

indexterm.product: author developer editor authorEclipse developerEclipse editorEclipse

keywords.indexterm: WebHelp Responsive Converting old publishing templates

body.p: WebHelp templates that were created in older versions of can be converted to the Publishing Template format that was introduced in version 20.0. This section contains several procedures for converting old templates depending on the version they were created in.
